typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		passengerid as integer,
		survived as integer,
		pclass as integer,
		name as string,
		sex as string,
		age as integer,
		sibsp as integer,
		parch as integer,
		ticket as string,
		fare as double,
		cabin as string,
		embarked as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(survived),
	count = count()) ~> Aggregate1
